aima.core.search.local
Class Individual<A>

java.lang.Object
  aima.core.search.local.Individual<A>
Type Parameters:
A - the type of the alphabet used in the representation of the individuals in the population (this is to provide flexibility in terms of how a problem can be encoded).
public class Individual<A>
extends java.lang.Object

Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 127.

A state in a genetic algorithm is represented as an individual from the population.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly
